text: Bryce Dallas Howard (born March 2, 1981) is an American actress, director, producer, model, and writer. She is the eldest daughter of actor and director Ron Howard. She is known for her role as Claire Dearing in the science fiction adventure movies Jurassic World (2015) and Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018). ==Movies== Year Title Role Notes 1989 Parenthood Strawberry-Blonde Girl in Audience 1995 Apollo 13 Girl in Yellow Dress 2000 How the Grinch Stole Christmas Surprised Who (as Bryce Howard) 2001 Harvard Student 2004 Book of Love Heather 2004 Ivy Elizabeth Walker 2005 Manderlay Grace Margaret Mulligan 2006 As You Like It Rosalind 2006 Lady in the Water Story 2006 Orchids — Short film; director and co-writer 2007 Spider-Man 3 Gwen Stacy 2008 Good Dick Kissing Woman Cameo 2008 Fisher Willow 2009 Terminator Salvation Katherine "Kate" Brewster Connor 2010 Victoria 2010 Hereafter Melanie 2011 Hilly Holbrook 2011 50/50 Rachael 2011 Restless — Producer 2012 Victoria (Eclipse incarnation) Archive footage 2015 Jurassic World Claire Dearing 2015 Solemates — Short film; director and writer 2016 Pete's Dragon Grace Meacham 2016 Gold Kay 2018 Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom Claire Dearing 2019 Bella (voice) 2019 Rocketman Sheila Eileen 2019 Dads — Documentary; director 2022 Jurassic World Dominion Claire Dearing Post-production TBA Argylle Filming ==References== ==Other websites== * Bryce Dallas Howard at brycedhoward.com * * * Bryce Dallas Howard at Internet Off-Broadway Database Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
